get.description:
There is one daily forecast for every registered Location. 
This forecast contains average pollen grain counts and average pollen level. 
This forecast changes every day and shows pollen forecasts in next 4 days (including today). 
In this moment the pollen types for forecasts are grass, olive, birch and ragweed.

200.description: A daily forecast was found for this location

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid auth token header

get.summary: Get daily forecast for a location

get.description:
There is one hourly forecast for every registered Location. 
This forecast contains instant pollen grain counts and instant pollen levels. 
This forecast changes every day and shows pollen forecasts every 6 hour. 
In this moment the pollen types for forecasts are grass, olive, birch and ragweed.

parameters.name: woeid

get.description:
A Location identify a city or town. 
All Location have a Where On Earth ID (WOEID) as defined by Yahoo [https://developer.yahoo.com/geo/geoplanet/guide/concepts.html#woeids].
To find a location you can use this endpoint or you can query Yahoo services [https://developer.yahoo.com/geo/geoplanet/],   
ie you can execute a YQL query like this (for Madrid): 
  https://query.yahooapis.com/v1/public/yql?q=select%20*%20from%20geo.places%20where%20text%3D%22Madrid%22&format=json

parameters.description: Query to search cities/towns by name in Europe
parameters.name: q

put.description:
A Location identify a city or town. 
All Location have a Where On Earth ID (WOEID) as defined by Yahoo [https://developer.yahoo.com/geo/geoplanet/guide/concepts.html#woeids]. 
All location must have WOEID of type Town in Europe.
When a location is registered the forecasts are not generated. The pollen forecasts for this new location will be available 
in the next forecasts generation (next day)
